## EasyCallControlFactory.createSingleCallControl() method

Creates a device with single-call-control functionality.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createSingleCallControl(device: IDevice, initialState?: ISingleInitialState): Promise<ISingleCallControl>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  device | [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) | an SDK device from which the call-control device will be constructed. |
|  initialState | [ISingleInitialState](./jabra-js.isingleinitialstate.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional parameter, which sets the initial state of the created object. Use it when handling device changes. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[ISingleCallControl](./jabra-js.isinglecallcontrol.md)<!-- -->&gt;

a Promise which emits a new [ISingleCallControl](./jabra-js.isinglecallcontrol.md)<!-- -->.

## Remarks

This is a simple interface only containing the basic functionality for handling easy call control.

If you wish to handle multiple calls and being able to set a call on hold, we advise you to use the MultiCallControl interface instead - see method `createMultiCallControl`
